snippet: Leicester City's club record signing Islam Slimani is ready to make his Premier League debut in Saturday's clash with Liverpool, manager Claudio Ranieri said on Thursday....

headline.main: Leicester's Slimani Ready for Premier League Debut at Liverpool
headline.print_headline: Leicester's Slimani Ready for Premier League Debut at Liverpool

lead_paragraph: Leicester City's club record signing Islam Slimani is ready to make his Premier League debut in Saturday's clash with Liverpool, manager Claudio Ranieri said on Thursday.

snippet: Playing with 10 men proved to be no problem for Liverpool in the English Premier League on Sunday....

headline.main: With 10 Men, United Loses, Liverpool Wins in Premier League
headline.print_headline: With 10 Men, United Loses, Liverpool Wins in Premier League

lead_paragraph: Playing with 10 men proved to be no problem for Liverpool in the English Premier League on Sunday.

snippet: Leicester City's unexpected surge to the top of the Premier League is not due to a change in mentality but because of the team's ability to keep a level head no matter where they find themselves in the table, goalkeeper Kasper Schmeichel has said....

headline.main: Leicester Keeping Calm at Premier League Peak-Schmeichel
headline.print_headline: Leicester Keeping Calm at Premier League Peak-Schmeichel

lead_paragraph: Leicester City's unexpected surge to the top of the Premier League is not due to a change in mentality but because of the team's ability to keep a level head no matter where they find themselves in the table, goalkeeper Kasper Schmeichel has said.

snippet: Tottenham squandered a lead for the second time this week to lose 2-1 to Southampton on Sunday, jeopardizing its attempt to finish in second place in the English Premier League....

headline.main: Tottenham Loses 2-1 at Southampton in Premier League
headline.print_headline: Tottenham Loses 2-1 at Southampton in Premier League

lead_paragraph: Tottenham squandered a lead for the second time this week to lose 2-1 to Southampton on Sunday, jeopardizing its attempt to finish in second place in the English Premier League.

snippet: Leicester missed its first opportunity to clinch the Premier League title, drawing 1-1 at Manchester United on Sunday to move within two points of the most unlikely championship in English soccer in a generation....

headline.main: Leicester Misses 1st Chance to Clinch Premier League Title
headline.print_headline: Leicester Misses 1st Chance to Clinch Premier League Title

lead_paragraph: Leicester missed its first opportunity to clinch the Premier League title, drawing 1-1 at Manchester United on Sunday to move within two points of the most unlikely championship in English soccer in a generation.

snippet: Jamie Vardy's stunning volley set Leicester on its way to a 2-0 victory over Liverpool on Tuesday, keeping the unlikely title challengers top of the Premier League on a night Manchester United rediscovered its scoring touch at Old Trafford....

headline.main: Vardy Keeps Leicester's Premier League Title Charge Rolling
headline.print_headline: Vardy Keeps Leicester's Premier League Title Charge Rolling

lead_paragraph: Jamie Vardy's stunning volley set Leicester on its way to a 2-0 victory over Liverpool on Tuesday, keeping the unlikely title challengers top of the Premier League on a night Manchester United rediscovered its scoring touch at Old Trafford.

snippet: Sunderland manager Sam Allardyce has called for English managers to be given more opportunities to lead top-flight clubs and voiced concern over the lack of English managers in the Premier League....

headline.main: Allardyce Bemoans Lack of English Managers in Premier League
headline.print_headline: Allardyce Bemoans Lack of English Managers in Premier League

lead_paragraph: Sunderland manager Sam Allardyce has called for English managers to be given more opportunities to lead top-flight clubs and voiced concern over the lack of English managers in the Premier League.

snippet: Manager Alan Pardew feels Crystal Palace have the chance to enjoy the most successful season in their recent history after they beat Tottenham Hotspur 1-0 to reach the FA Cup quarter-finals....

headline.main: Palace Can Still Have Best Premier League Season-Pardew
headline.print_headline: Palace Can Still Have Best Premier League Season-Pardew

lead_paragraph: Manager Alan Pardew feels Crystal Palace have the chance to enjoy the most successful season in their recent history after they beat Tottenham Hotspur 1-0 to reach the FA Cup quarter-finals.

snippet: Tottenham Hotspur midfielder Eric Dier does not see any side running away with the Premier League title this season and says the genuine contenders will only be known after the packed yearend schedule....

headline.main: Premier League Title Talk 'Premature', Says Spurs' Dier
headline.print_headline: Premier League Title Talk 'Premature', Says Spurs' Dier

lead_paragraph: Tottenham Hotspur midfielder Eric Dier does not see any side running away with the Premier League title this season and says the genuine contenders will only be known after the packed yearend schedule.

snippet: Records tumbled in the transfer window as Premier League spending totaled 1.165 billion pounds ($1.54 billion),  financial analyst Deloitte's Sports Business Group said on Thursday....

headline.main: Premier League Outlay Tops $1.5 Billion in Window
headline.print_headline: Premier League Outlay Tops $1.5 Billion in Window

lead_paragraph: Records tumbled in the transfer window as Premier League spending totaled 1.165 billion pounds ($1.54 billion),  financial analyst Deloitte's Sports Business Group said on Thursday.
